venue.name: Fiserv Forum
venue.address: 1111 Vel R. Phillips Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53203

restaurants_bars.name: The Mecca Sports Bar and Grill
restaurants_bars.address: 1134 N Vel R. Phillips Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53203
restaurants_bars.description: A large sports bar with massive screens for game days, located just steps from Fiserv Forum, offering a lively atmosphere for Bucks fans.

restaurants_bars.name: Drink Wisconsinbly Pub
restaurants_bars.description: Celebrating Wisconsin's culture, this pub offers local brews and spirits, with a festive vibe on game days, located in the entertainment district near Fiserv Forum.

restaurants_bars.name: Good City Brewing
restaurants_bars.description: A craft brewery with a rooftop offering great views and a variety of beers, a short walk from Fiserv Forum, perfect for pre-game and post-game gatherings.

accommodations.name: Aloft Milwaukee Downtown
accommodations.address: 1230 N Old World 3rd St, Milwaukee, WI 53212
accommodations.description: A trendy hotel with modern rooms and a bar, located within walking distance to Fiserv Forum and Milwaukee's downtown attractions.

accommodations.name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Milwaukee Downtown
accommodations.description: Comfortable suites and complimentary breakfast, conveniently located a short walk from Fiserv Forum, ideal for Bucks fans visiting the city.

tourist_attractions.name: Milwaukee Art Museum
tourist_attractions.address: 700 N Art Museum Dr, Milwaukee, WI 53202
tourist_attractions.description: An iconic museum known for its architecturally significant building and extensive collection of artworks, a short drive from Fiserv Forum.

tourist_attractions.name: Harley-Davidson Museum
tourist_attractions.description: Showcasing the history, culture, and engineering of Harley-Davidson motorcycles, this museum is a must-visit for enthusiasts, located a brief drive from the arena.

team_related_activities.name: Bucks Pro Shop at Fiserv Forum
team_related_activities.address: 1111 Vel R. Phillips Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53203
team_related_activities.description: The official store for Milwaukee Bucks merchandise, offering a wide selection of gear located within the Fiserv Forum.

options.description: Milwaukee County Transit System (MCTS) offers several bus routes that stop near Fiserv Forum, facilitating easy access from various parts of the city.
The Hop, Milwaukee's streetcar system, has stops that are conveniently located within walking distance to Fiserv Forum, offering an easy way to reach the game.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Bucks tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Bucks tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
